UseCustomPlayerScale.title: Use Custom Player Scale
UseCustomPlayerScale.tooltip: Overrides the player scale to the value below. Disabling this will not reset the player's size. If you get softlocked because of the player's size, hold '/' for 5 seconds to disable and then reset the loop.

CustomPlayerScale.title: Player Scale Multiplier
CustomPlayerScale.tooltip: Changes the size of the player.

UseScaleHotkeys.title: Use Scale Hotkeys
UseScaleHotkeys.tooltip: When enabled, you can press '<' to half the player's size, '>' to double it, and '/' to return to normal.

UseOtherCustomScales.title: Use Other Custom Scales
UseOtherCustomScales.tooltip: Allows you to override the scale of the below types of objects. Disabling this does not reset objects that have already been resized.
